welcome.title: Welcome to OneMed SupplyChain
welcome.description: A tool for sending reminders to suppliers about delivery dates

settings.displayNameHelp: This name will be shown in Slack notifications
settings.slackWebhookUrlHelp: Webhook URL for Slack notifications. Keep this secret!
settings.slackNotificationsHelp: Send notifications to Slack when emails are sent

fileUpload.title: Upload Excel file
fileUpload.rowsReady: rows of data ready for processing
fileUpload.dropFile: Drag and drop the Excel file here, or click to select file
fileUpload.fileRequirement: The file must contain the "BP" sheet with data from row 6
fileUpload.whatToDo: What do I need to do?
fileUpload.instruction1: Download the latest version of the "BP" sheet from the system.
fileUpload.instruction2: Make sure you export the "BP" sheet as a .xlsx file with data from row 6.
fileUpload.instruction3: The sheet must contain columns C-P with PO number, supplier info, ETA dates and quantities.
fileUpload.instruction4: Drag and drop the file here, or click to select it.

errors.noFileSelected: No file selected or file type is invalid
errors.validationSuccessButDatabaseFailed: Data validated but database save failed
errors.dataValidatedButNotSaved: Data validated but not saved to local database

success.importCompleted: Import successful and data saved to database

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.sendingModeDescription: Choose between single supplier or multiple suppliers

weekdaySelect.title: Select weekday
weekdaySelect.description: Select a weekday to see suppliers planned for that day.
weekdaySelect.noWeekdays: No weekdays found for this planner
weekdaySelect.noSuppliersPlanned: There are no suppliers planned for this planner.

supplierSelect.title: Select supplier
supplierSelect.description: Shows only suppliers planned for {weekday} and with open orders.
supplierSelect.noSuppliersFound: No suppliers with open orders found for this weekday

dataReview.title: Review data
dataReview.noDataAvailable: No data available. Please select a supplier first.

bulkSupplierSelect.description: Select suppliers to receive reminders about outstanding orders
bulkSupplierSelect.mixedLanguageWarning: Warning: You have selected suppliers with different languages. Emails will be sent in the correct language per supplier.
bulkSupplierSelect.noSuppliersFound: No suppliers with outstanding orders found for this weekday
bulkSupplierSelect.totalOutstandingLines: outstanding order lines total (excluded lines not included)
bulkSupplierSelect.mixedLanguageInfo: Mixed languages: Emails will be sent in the correct language per supplier

bulkDataReview.title: Review and select order lines
bulkDataReview.mixedLanguageWarning: Warning: Mixed languages detected. Emails will be sent in the correct language per supplier.
bulkDataReview.validationNote: Note: All suppliers must have at least one selected order line

bulkEmailPreview.allEmailsFailed: All {count} emails failed. Check error messages and try again.
bulkEmailPreview.title: Email preview and sending
bulkEmailPreview.mixedLanguageInfo: Info: Mixed languages detected. Emails will be sent in the correct language per supplier.
bulkEmailPreview.noEmailWarning: ⚠️ No email address provided - email will not be sent
